meta.description: See how Projekt AI turns simple text inputs into polished, social-ready reels in minutes using an end-to-end AI automation pipeline.

hero.subtitle: Turn simple profile inputs into polished, social-ready video reels in under five minutes – no editing skills required.

challenge.overview: Creating engaging social media content demands significant time and expertise, especially for music creators who need to maintain a consistent presence across multiple platforms.

points.title: Time Constraints
points.description: Music producers and DJs have limited time to create professional-quality social media content while focusing on their craft.

points.title: Technical Barriers
points.description: Many creators lack video editing skills but need professional-quality reels to promote their music and performances.

points.title: Consistency Issues
points.description: Maintaining consistent branding and messaging across multiple social platforms creates significant overhead.

solution.overview: We built an end-to-end automation system that transforms simple text inputs into polished, branded video reels ready for social media.

points.title: Multi-Channel Input
points.description: Users can submit content via Telegram bot, WhatsApp, Airtable form, or web interface.

points.title: AI-Driven Content Generation
points.description: GPT-4 transforms basic inputs into compelling captions, calls-to-action, and motion graphics text.

points.title: Template-Based Rendering
points.description: Dynamic templates with brand colors, motion graphics, and music ensure consistent high-quality output.

workflow.overview: The automation process follows a streamlined workflow from input to distribution, with minimal human intervention required.

steps.title: Input Collection
steps.description: User provides basic information through their preferred channel (Telegram, WhatsApp, web form).

steps.title: Content Enhancement
steps.description: AI processes the input to generate optimized captions, hashtags, and motion graphics text.

steps.title: Media Assembly
steps.description: System pulls audio samples, brand elements, and background visuals to create the reel elements.

steps.title: Rendering & Delivery
steps.description: Cloud-based rendering combines all elements and delivers the finished reel back to the user.

results.overview: The automation system has dramatically reduced content creation time while maintaining high-quality output.

metrics.title: Time Efficiency
metrics.description: Creation time reduced from 2 hours to 5 minutes per reel.

metrics.title: Cost Reduction
metrics.description: Cost per reel reduced from $50-100 to less than $0.50 each.

metrics.title: Content Volume
metrics.description: Clients can produce 3x more content with the same resources.

metrics.title: Engagement
metrics.description: Average increase in engagement across automated reels.

testimonial.quote: The automation system has completely transformed our content strategy. We're posting more consistently and seeing better results, all while spending less time on production.
testimonial.name: Alex Thompson

technical.overview: The system uses a modern stack focused on cloud-based media processing and AI integration.
